If "choy" is intended to be a standard word in English, then "Men are mad."

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: Men har kuni ertalab sport bilan shug‘ullanaman.
output: Men have no knowledge of your sports rules.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: Kecha biz do‘stlar bilan parkda sayr qildik.
output: We met our friends at the park.
expected: Yesterday we walked in the park with friends.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: U yangi telefon sotib oldi va juda xursand bo‘ldi.
output: "I just got a new phone and it's very expensive."
expected: He bought a new phone and was very happy.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: Men ingliz tilini o‘rganishni davom ettiryapman.
output: "Men English language learning continues."
expected: I am continuing to learn English.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: Biz yozda tog‘larga sayohat qilishni rejalashtiryapmiz.
output: We plan to take a road trip together.
expected: We are planning to travel to the mountains in summer.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: U o‘zining yangi ishini juda yaxshi ko‘radi.
output: You are very kind in recognizing your own new work.
expected: She really likes her new job.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: Men kitob o‘qishdan zavq olaman.
output: Men should take care not to waste time in studying books.
expected: I enjoy reading books.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: Kechasi yomg‘ir yog‘ib, havo salqinlashdi.
output: "He has a new job, he has had a good conversation."
expected: It rained at night and the weather cooled down.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: U universitetda informatika bo‘yicha o‘qiyapti.
output: In the university, I graduated in informatics.
expected: He is studying computer science at the university.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: Biz oilamiz bilan hafta oxiri kinoga bordik.
output: "We finished the weekend with oil."
expected: We went to the cinema with our family on the weekend.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: U o‘z maqsadiga erishish uchun qat’iyat bilan ishladi.
output: He worked with determination to achieve his goal.
expected: He worked with determination to achieve his goal.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: Hayotda eng katta boylik — sog‘liqdir.
output: In this context, "There is no greater joy than happiness."
expected: The greatest wealth in life is health.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: U juda dono inson bo‘lib, har doim to‘g‘ri maslahat beradi.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: Qiyin vaziyatlarda ham umidni yo‘qotmaslik kerak.
output: In difficult situations, we must not lose hope.
expected: One should not lose hope even in difficult situations.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: Yaxshi do‘st — qiyinchilikda bilinadi.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: U uzoq o‘ylab, nihoyat to‘g‘ri qarorga keldi.

expected: He thought for a long time and finally made the right decision.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: Har bir insonning hayotida o‘ziga xos sinovlar bo‘ladi.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: U mehnatkashligi va halolligi bilan boshqalardan ajralib turadi.
output: "He is different from others in terms of morality and values."
expected: He stands out from others with his diligence and honesty.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: Inson hayoti davomida bilim izlashdan to‘xtamasligi lozim.
output: It is necessary to discontinue the pursuit of knowledge after insomnia.
expected: A person should never stop seeking knowledge throughout life.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: Har qanday muvaffaqiyat sabr-toqat va mehnat bilan keladi.
output: "He comes with patience and dedication."
expected: Any success comes with patience and hard work.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: Dasturiy ta’minotning yangi versiyasi xavfsizlik protokollarini yangiladi.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: Serverning ishlash tezligini optimallashtirish uchun kechiktirish vaqtini qisqartirish kerak.
output: To optimize the serving speed, it is necessary to reduce the idle time.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: Ma’lumotlar bazasi indekslash orqali so‘rovlarni tezroq qayta ishlaydi.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: Sun’iy intellekt modeli katta hajmdagi ma’lumotlar ustida o‘qitildi.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: Sensorlar real vaqt rejimida harorat va namlikni o‘lchaydi.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: Algoritm murakkab hisob-kitoblarni millisekundlarda bajaradi.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: Tizimdagi xatoliklar jurnal faylida avtomatik ravishda qayd etiladi.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: Kiberxavfsizlik siyosati foydalanuvchi ma’lumotlarini himoya qilishga qaratilgan.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: Sensor tarmog‘i uzluksiz monitoring orqali energiya sarfini kamaytiradi.

input: Translate the following text from uz to en and provide only the translated text: Bulutli xizmatlar foydalanuvchilarga moslashuvchan saqlash hajmini taqdim etadi.
